abstract.para: The &ostack; project provides a variety of command line tools with which you can manage the variety of services within your cloud. The command line interface also allows for automation of tasks as it can be used for scripting. Each ? of the core &ostack; services has its own command line tool: for example, use keystone for maning users and projects, nova for managing instances and flavors, or glance for managing images.
